name: Tempo Jumper
description:
A rhythm game where you write rhythms to complete platformer levels.

A game made by CaféHaine (me), Romshine and Eterniitys for the LÖVE Jam 2020

All the assets were made during the jam:

  • Sound: made with Nescaline on LMMS
  • (bad) Graphics: made with Gimp

Used libraries:

  • My own GUI library used in coffeecross
